youtube:
Si aad u hesho macluumaadkaaga RTMP ee YouTube, gal akoonkaaga YouTube ka dibna u gudub CREATE> Toos u gal. Waxaad markaas arki doontaa shaashadda soo socota:
{{youtubeLive}}
Nuqul "Stream URL" oo geli "RTMP URL halkan" ku dheji. Marka xigta, koobbi "Stream key" oo ku dheji goobta "Stream key". Guji "Go Live" si aad u bilowdo socodka tooska ah.
{{rtmpLive}}
facebook:
Waxaad ku qulquli kartaa profile kaaga adigoo isticmaalaya RTMP oo ka socda Facebook's Live Live bogga (oo gujinaya Create Live Stream) ama adigoo gujinaya batoonka tooska ah ee goobta Abuur bogga ama astaanta aad rabto inaad u qulqulo. Waxaa lagugu keeni doonaa Soosaaraha tooska ah ee Facebook.
Hoos ugu dhaadhac daawashada horudhaca Hubi hoosta "Bilow" in liiska hoos u dhaca loo dejiyay Isticmaalka Furayaasha Streamka. Waxaad ka heli doontaa RTMP URL iyo furaha qulqulka ee meeshan. (Fiiro gaar ah: Aragtida fiidyahaaga ayaa weli ka muuqda geeska midig ee hoose. Marka xigta, koobbi "Stream key" oo ku dheji goobta "Stream key". Guji "Go Live" si aad u bilowdo socodka tooska ah.
{{rtmpLive}}
